metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3702 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - high.
metadata.Description: A race condition flaw was found in ansible-runner, where an attacker could watch for rapid creation and deletion of a temporary directory, substitute their directory at that name, and then have access to ansible-runner's private_data_dir the next time ansible-runner made use of the private_data_dir. The highest Threat out of this flaw is to integrity and confidentiality.

criterions.comment: ansible-runner package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
